attributes.action: Don't support the idea of free bus passes for the under 16s
attributes.additional_details: Please don't support the Deputy Primister in his crazy idea of the free bus passes for all under sixteens.  This will cost the taxpayer a shedload by pushing up council tax to subsidise it, or cutting other services exhaustedly. It will fill the buses with noisy, unruly kids.  What's more, where is the incentive for people to try to support their own family, if the state isjust going to keep picking up the tab for every expense that having a child incurs.Thank you for taking the time and trouble to read this.
